meanings.definition: A food produced by bacterial fermentation of milk
meanings.sent1: I enjoy having yoghurts for breakfast every day.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of yoghurts in different flavors.

meanings.definition: A creamy, often sweetened, dairy product

meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and sweet as a spoonful of creamy yoghurts.
meanings.sent5: The creamy yoghurts melted in my mouth, leaving a delightful taste.
